Title: Buck the System
Plot: Dexter tries to bring Debra on board with his new target. While the Ukrainian mob seeks revenge for the killing of one of their own, Quinn grows close to a dancer at their strip club. LaGuerta, convinced the Bay Harbor Butcher is still out there, attempts to enlist Batista to help her re-open the case.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
GuestStars: Ray Stevenson, Yvonne Strahovski, Matt Gerald
